hymn.title: Christ the Savior hath ascended (Alternate Tune)

layout.singingstanza: Christ the Sav -- ior hath as -- cend -- ed To the heav -- ens far a -- bove, Crowned with glo -- ry and with hon -- or By the Fath -- er God in love; He hath made Him Head of all things, His su -- prem -- a -- cy to prove.

lyrics.stanza: Christ the Savior hath ascended To the heavens far above, Crowned with glory and with honor By the Father God in love; He hath made Him Head of all things, His supremacy to prove.
From this Christ to God ascended Hath the Spirit been outpoured, Poured upon the Church, His Body, That His members be empow'red; Thus the Lord of all in heaven Thru His Church will be adored.
Hallelujah, 'tis accomplished, And accomplished once for all! Hallelujah, we're included, All included, great or small! Praise Him, He hath sent the Spirit And baptized the Church withal!
